member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandContext
member.summary: Provides the context in which a SharePoint command is being executed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandContext.Logger
member.summary: Gets the log service which you can use to write messages to the Output window or Error List window in Visual Studio.
member.returns: An instance representing the log service.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandContext.Refresh
member.summary: Refreshes the context with new instances of the Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite and Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb objects.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandContext.Site
member.summary: Gets a Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite that represents the SharePoint site collection on which the command is run.
member.returns: The SharePoint site collection on which the command is run.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandContext.Web
member.summary: Gets a Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb that represents the SharePoint site on which the command is run.
member.returns: The SharePoint site on which the command is run.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandLogger
member.summary: Represents the logging service for SharePoint commands.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandLogger.WriteLine(System.String,Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory)
member.summary: Writes a message to the Output window or Error List window with the specified category.
member.param: The category of the message. This specifies whether the message appears in the Output window or Error List window (or both), and where the message appears in the Error List window.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandLogger.WriteLine(System.String,Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a message to the Output window or Error List window with the specified category and Help keyword.
member.param: The category of the message. This specifies whether the message appears in the Output window or Error List window (or both), and where the message appears in the Error List window.
The Help keyword for the error.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandLogger.WriteLine(System.String,Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes a message to the Output window or Error List window with the specified category and error location information.
member.param: The category of the message. This specifies whether the message appears in the Output window or Error List window (or both), and where the message appears in the Error List window.
The full path to the file with the error or warning.
The line number of the error or warning.
The column number of the error or warning.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandLogger.WriteLine(System.String,Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a message to the Output window or Error List window with the specified category, error location information, and Help keyword.
member.param: The category of the message. This specifies whether the message appears in the Output window or Error List window (or both), and where the message appears in the Error List window.
The full path to the file with the error or warning.
The line number of the error or warning.
The column number of the error or warning.
The Help keyword for the error.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory
member.summary: Specifies where messages written by using the SharePoint log service appear in the Output window and Error List window.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory.Error
member.summary: Specifies that the message appears in the Output window and in the Errors group of the Error List window.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory.Warning
member.summary: Specifies that the message appears in the Output window and in the Warning group of the Error List window.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory.Verbose
member.summary: Specifies that the message appears only in the Output window, if verbose messages are enabled. The message does not appear in the Error List window.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory.Message
member.summary: Specifies that the message appears in the Output window and in the Message group of the Error List window.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory.Status
member.summary: Specifies that the message appears only in the Output window. The message does not appear in the Error List window.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.SharePointCommandAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that a method is a SharePoint command.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.SharePointCommandAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.SharePointCommandAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified command ID.
member.param: The ID for the SharePoint command. The ID should be unique; it is recommended that you use the name of the method preceded by the method's namespace.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.SharePointCommandAttribute.CommandId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the command.
member.returns: A string representing a command ID.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.SharePointCommandServices
member.summary: Represents services that can be used in a SharePoint command implementation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.SharePointCommandServices.GetProperties(System.Object)
member.summary: Retrieves a dictionary with properties for the specified component.
member.returns: An object representing a dictionary of component properties.
member.param: The component for which to retrieve the dictionary.
